720: Description Founded in 1989, CALNET, Inc. is a privately held company in the Technology, Intelligence Analysis, and Language Services consulting arena. Headquartered in Reston, VA, CALNET employees deliver true value to our customers by employing best practices, world class technologies industry expertise in every project. CALNET is an ISO 9001, ISO 20000, and CMMI-Level III certified. We are currently searching for a talented All Source Analyst Level 2 to support the DHS in the Arlington, VA area. Responsibilities: Conduct All Source Analysis on open-source materials. Also includes Watch operations work and collaboration with other DoD agencies as directed. Requirements: Must have a TS/SCI Clearance 6 years' experience in All Source intelligence operations pertaining to, but not limited to, counterterrorism, infrastructure, cybersecurity, counterdrug, travel, science, and fluency in/active usage of languages used in the analytic intelligence and counterintelligence process, border security, and all phases of the intelligence cycle, such as production and dissemination. Minimum education is a High School diploma. An associate degree lowers the experience requirement to 4 years and a bachelor's degree lowers the experience requirement to 2. Provides strategic, operational, and tactical analysis as required based on raw intelligence collected from a variety of sources, i.e. INTs. Applies knowledge of INT-specific analysis techniques as required. Possesses at least working knowledge of (preferably hands-on experience with) databases and software programs used in the intelligence environment, including but not limited to: Microsoft Office suite, M3, TAC, HOTR, Google Earth, Intelink, National Exploitation System, Gemini, MIDB, GCCS-J, various message handling systems. Must possess excellent oral, writing, and coordination skills to communicate factual information clearly and concisely, both orally and in writing, often under pressure and tight deadlines that meets or exceeds established analytical standards. Place of Performance Work will be conducted at Department of Homeland Security at 1310 North Courthouse Road, Arlington, VA 22201 or nearby contractor facility. Applicant must be a U.S Citizen and have a Current Active TOP SECRET/SCI Security Clearance with SCI Eligibility. CALNET, Inc. offers a competitive salary and a generous benefits package. This package includes medical, dental, vision, life, short- and long-term disability insurances, a 401(k)-retirement savings plan, and generous leave time. CALNET, Inc. is an Equal Opportunity Employer. EEO/M/F/D/V www.CALNET.com
